title: Just a patch of scrub
creator_credit: World Wide Fund for Nature Australia
brief_description: Overviews traditional problems with the land including clearing, soil erosion and salinity. Discusses the importance of preserving and benefits of remnant native vegetation and shows the revegatation of a wasteland area where land had been cleared. Includes comprehensive teaching notes.
